original_text:
Candy Dreams: Bingo
Tombola!
La Evoplay in passato ci ha deliziato con Candy Dreams, una slot a tema dolciumi che in breve tempo ha raggiunto il cuore di numerosi giocatori sparsi in tutto il mondo. È di pochi giorni fa il lancio sul mercato di «Candy Dreams: Bingo», che mantenendo lo stesso tema e variando solo il gameplay, siamo certi riuscirà a eguagliare il successo del suo illustre predecessore.
La grafica è un’esplosione di colori, anche se il predominante è il rosa. Sullo sfondo si vede una piazza e un palazzo su cui capeggia l’insegna Ice Cream mentre dal tetto colano gelati alla fragola e al cioccolato con tanto di cialda. La griglia di gioco si trova al centro dello schermo, ai lati altri due riquadri: in uno vengono accolti i numeri estratti, nell’altra le linee di pagamento e i relativi moltiplicatori. Nella parte bassa invece sono posizionati i tasti per le giocate. Anche sul versante sonoro la Evoplay ha fatto le cose per bene, con un motivetto cadenzato che rende le giocate allegre e spensierate.
 
Com’è fatta Candy Dreams: Bingo
Non essendo una slot nel senso stretto della parola, non possiamo parlare di rulli e righe, ma di contenitore che può accogliere 25 numeri.
La scommessa base è di 0,10 monete virtuali, visto che la versione qui illustrata è quella dimostrativa, quindi senza soldi veri.
Vengono considerate vincenti tutte le combinazioni che si sviluppano in orizzontale, in verticale e in diagonale. La vincita massima, contando i moltiplicatori applicati, è di 10.017 volte la puntata.
Per chi non ha voglia di cliccare continuamente sul tasto Start, può affidarsi alla classica funzione Autoplay, con cui si possono selezionare da 10 a 100 giri automatici. Si può avere un controllo maggiore su entrate e uscite impostando limiti di vincita e di perdita oltre i quali il gioco si arresterà.
La volatilità è alta, mentre il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è pari al 95,85%.
 
Come si gioca a Candy Dreams: Bingo
Il meccanismo di gioco è molto semplice. A ogni Spin atterreranno 25 numeri nella griglia principale e 40 nel riquadro di destra, tutti generati in modo casuale. I numeri che corrispondono spariscono e al loro posto appare il simbolo del gelato. Quando viene formata una combo di almeno 5 simboli, allora si ottiene una vittoria. Inoltre, alle prime combinazioni formate viene applicato il moltiplicatore più alto, visibile nel riquadro di destra. In questo modo si possono ottenere un moltiplicatore 25x, 100x, 250x e sino a un massimo di 10.000x!

Domande Frequenti 
A quanto corrisponde il valore RTP?

In questo gioco il ritorno teorico al giocatore è pari al 95,85%



Ci sono giri gratuiti in Candy Dreams: Bingo?

No, non sono previsti simboli speciali, né Wild, né Scatter.



Posso giocare a Candy Dreams: Bingo anche sullo smartphone?

Certo, l’architettura HTML5 di questo gioco permette di poterne usufruire su qualsiasi dispositivo, mobile o fisso.

raw_translation.response:
Candy Dreams: Bingo

Tombola! Evoplay has delighted us in the past with Candy Dreams, a candy-themed slot that quickly won the hearts of numerous players around the world. Just a few days ago, "Candy Dreams: Bingo" was launched on the market, which maintains the same theme and gameplay variations. We are certain that it will equal the success of its illustrious predecessor.

The graphics are an explosion of colors, with pink being the predominant one. In the background, you can see a square and a building with an Ice Cream sign on top. Strawberry and chocolate ice cream flows from the roof, complete with waffles. The game grid is in the center of the screen, with two other squares on the sides: one for the numbers drawn and the other for the paylines and their multipliers. At the bottom, you will find the play buttons. On the sound side, Evoplay did an excellent job, with a rhythmic tune that makes the plays cheerful and carefree.

How is Candy Dreams: Bingo played?

Not being a slot in the strict sense of the word, we cannot talk about reels and rows. Instead, we have a container that can hold 25 numbers. The basic bet is 0.10 virtual coins, since the version illustrated here is just for demonstration purposes and does not involve real money. All combinations that develop horizontally, vertically, and diagonally are considered winning. The maximum win, with the applied multipliers, is 10,017 times the bet. For those who do not want to click continuously on the Start button, you can rely on the classic Autoplay function, where you can select from 10 to 100 automatic spins. You can have greater control over your winnings and losses by setting limits that stop the game when exceeded. The volatility is high, while the theoretical return to the player (RTP) is 95.85%.

The gameplay mechanism is very simple. Each spin will land 25 numbers in the main grid and 40 in the right-hand square, all generated randomly. The corresponding numbers disappear, and in their place appears the ice cream symbol. When a combo of at least 5 symbols is formed, you win. Furthermore, the highest multiplier is applied to the first combinations formed, visible in the right-hand square. In this way, you can obtain a 25x, 100x, 250x multiplier, and up to a maximum of 10,000x!

FAQ

What is the RTP value?

The theoretical return to the player in this game is 95.85%.

Are there any free spins in Candy Dreams: Bingo?

No, there are no special symbols, Wilds, or Scatters.

Can I play Candy Dreams: Bingo on my smartphone?

Certainly, the HTML5 architecture of this game allows you to play on any device, mobile, or fixed.

raw_translation.response:
Candy Dreams: Bingo - A Sweet Treat for Experienced Gamblers

Tombola! Evoplay has once again impressed us with Candy Dreams: a delectable slot game that has captured the hearts of players worldwide. Recently released, Candy Dreams: Bingo features the same candy theme, with a new and exciting gameplay that we're sure will match the success of its predecessor.

The graphics are a vibrant explosion of colors, dominated by pink. A plaza and a building with an Ice Cream sign can be seen in the background, with strawberry and chocolate ice creams flowing down from the roof. The game board is in the center of the screen, with two other panels on either side - one that has the drawn numbers, and the other with the paylines and multipliers. The lower part of the screen has the buttons for bets. The Evoplay has done a great job on the sound, with a rhythmic tune that makes the gameplay lively and enjoyable.

How it Works

As a bingo-inspired game, rather than a traditional slot game, Candy Dreams has a container that can accommodate 25 numbers. The basic bet is 0.10 virtual coins. A winning combination is formed by a minimum of 5 symbols that occur horizontally, vertically or diagonally. The maximum payout, including all multipliers applied, can be up to 10,017 times the bet.

For players who don't want to click Start continuously, there is the Autoplay function that allows for selection of 10 to 100 automatic turns. Setting win and loss limits offer more control over the game.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the RTP?

The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 95.85%.

Are there free spins?

No, Candy Dreams does not have special symbols like Wild or Scatter.

Can I play Candy Dreams: Bingo on my smartphone?

Yes, with the HTML5 architecture, Candy Dreams: Bingo can be played on any mobile or desktop device. 

Experience the sweet sensation of Candy Dreams: Bingo and watch as those combos form and shoot those multipliers up to 10,000x!

review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Candy Dreams: Bingo".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay and Rules
Winning Combinations
Game Features and Special Symbols

Compatibility with Devices

- No FAQ
- No Notes

Review: Candy Dreams: Bingo

Tombola! Evoplay has delighted us in the past with Candy Dreams, a candy-themed slot that quickly won the hearts of numerous players around the world. Just a few days ago, "Candy Dreams: Bingo" was launched on the market, which maintains the same theme and gameplay variations. We are certain that it will equal the success of its illustrious predecessor.

The graphics are an explosion of colors, with pink being the predominant one. In the background, you can see a square and a building with an Ice Cream sign on top. Strawberry and chocolate ice cream flows from the roof, complete with waffles. The game grid is in the center of the screen, with two other squares on the sides: one for the numbers drawn and the other for the paylines and their multipliers. At the bottom, you will find the play buttons. On the sound side, Evoplay did an excellent job, with a rhythmic tune that makes the plays cheerful and carefree.

How is Candy Dreams: Bingo played?

Not being a slot in the strict sense of the word, we cannot talk about reels and rows. Instead, we have a container that can hold 25 numbers. The basic bet is 0.10 virtual coins, since the version illustrated here is just for demonstration purposes and does not involve real money. All combinations that develop horizontally, vertically, and diagonally are considered winning. The maximum win, with the applied multipliers, is 10,017 times the bet. For those who do not want to click continuously on the Start button, you can rely on the classic Autoplay function, where you can select from 10 to 100 automatic spins. You can have greater control over your winnings and losses by setting limits that stop the game when exceeded. The volatility is high, while the theoretical return to the player (RTP) is 95.85%.

The gameplay mechanism is very simple. Each spin will land 25 numbers in the main grid and 40 in the right-hand square, all generated randomly. The corresponding numbers disappear, and in their place appears the ice cream symbol. When a combo of at least 5 symbols is formed, you win. Furthermore, the highest multiplier is applied to the first combinations formed, visible in the right-hand square. In this way, you can obtain a 25x, 100x, 250x multiplier, and up to a maximum of 10,000x!

FAQ

What is the RTP value?

The theoretical return to the player in this game is 95.85%.

Are there any free spins in Candy Dreams: Bingo?

No, there are no special symbols, Wilds, or Scatters.

Can I play Candy Dreams: Bingo on my smartphone?

Gameplay and Rules

The highest multiplier is applied to the first combinations formed, visible in the right-hand square. The multipliers available are 25x, 100x, 250x, and up to a maximum of 10,000x.

Game Features and Special Symbols

Review: Candy Dreams: Bingo

Tombola! Evoplay has delighted us in the past with Candy Dreams, a candy-themed slot that quickly won the hearts of numerous players around the world. Just a few days ago, "Candy Dreams: Bingo" was launched on the market, which maintains the same theme and gameplay variations. We are certain that it will equal the success of its illustrious predecessor.

The graphics are an explosion of colors, with pink being the predominant one. In the background, you can see a square and a building with an Ice Cream sign on top. Strawberry and chocolate ice cream flows from the roof, complete with waffles. The game grid is in the center of the screen, with two other squares on the sides: one for the numbers drawn and the other for the paylines and their multipliers. At the bottom, you will find the play buttons. On the sound side, Evoplay did an excellent job, with a rhythmic tune that makes the plays cheerful and carefree.

How is Candy Dreams: Bingo played?

Not being a slot in the strict sense of the word, we cannot talk about reels and rows. Instead, we have a container that can hold 25 numbers. The basic bet is 0.10 virtual coins, since the version illustrated here is just for demonstration purposes and does not involve real money. All combinations that develop horizontally, vertically, and diagonally are considered winning. The maximum win, with the applied multipliers, is 10,017 times the bet. For those who do not want to click continuously on the Start button, you can rely on the classic Autoplay function, where you can select from 10 to 100 automatic spins. You can have greater control over your winnings and losses by setting limits that stop the game when exceeded. The volatility is high, while the theoretical return to the player (RTP) is 95.85%.

The gameplay mechanism is very simple. Each spin will land 25 numbers in the main grid and 40 in the right-hand square, all generated randomly. The corresponding numbers disappear, and in their place appears the ice cream symbol. When a combo of at least 5 symbols is formed, you win. Furthermore, the highest multiplier is applied to the first combinations formed, visible in the right-hand square. In this way, you can obtain a 25x, 100x, 250x multiplier, and up to a maximum of 10,000x!

FAQ

What is the RTP value?

The theoretical return to the player in this game is 95.85%.

Are there any free spins in Candy Dreams: Bingo?

No, there are no special symbols, Wilds, or Scatters.

Can I play Candy Dreams: Bingo on my smartphone?

Certainly, the HTML5 architecture of this game allows you to play on any device, mobile, or fixed.
